Sentencas: Lanthanum-strontium cobaltites are excellent mixed ionic and electronic conductors and exhibit good activity for the oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) at temperatures higher than 500 degrees C.
Titulo: Correlation between Structural, Chemical, and Electrochemical Properties of La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-d Nanopowders for Application in Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This led to these materials being proposed as cathodes for solid-oxide fuel cell devices, either for the standard high temperature (SOFC, 900-1000 degrees C) or the intermediate temperature (IT-SOFC, 500-700 degrees C) range.
Titulo: Correlation between Structural, Chemical, and Electrochemical Properties of La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-d Nanopowders for Application in Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Although it was determined that crystal structure and oxygen vacancies play a central role in these properties, little is known about cobalt speciation at SOFC or IT-SOFC working temperatures.
Titulo: Correlation between Structural, Chemical, and Electrochemical Properties of La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-d Nanopowders for Application in Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In this study the cobalt speciation and local order of La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-d (LSC) is analyzed in detail for the first time in nano- and microstructured powders by means of in situ experiments using Xray absorption, spectroscopy (XAS) in the temperature range of 20-700 degrees C.
Titulo: Correlation between Structural, Chemical, and Electrochemical Properties of La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-d Nanopowders for Application in Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The electrochemical performance of LSC-based cathodes in symmetrical cells under the same conditions is also studied using electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS).
Titulo: Correlation between Structural, Chemical, and Electrochemical Properties of La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-d Nanopowders for Application in Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Cobalt atoms can be found in any of the three possible oxidation states.
Titulo: Correlation between Structural, Chemical, and Electrochemical Properties of La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-d Nanopowders for Application in Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Their relative amount depends on temperature and crystallite size.
Titulo: Correlation between Structural, Chemical, and Electrochemical Properties of La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-d Nanopowders for Application in Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In crystallites of a few tens of nanometers, the ease with which Co atoms change their oxidation state is enhanced.
Titulo: Correlation between Structural, Chemical, and Electrochemical Properties of La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-d Nanopowders for Application in Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This effect probably facilitates oxide transport in LSC-based cathodes.
Titulo: Correlation between Structural, Chemical, and Electrochemical Properties of La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-d Nanopowders for Application in Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
